testcase.name: The "All" Filter is show by default
The "My Campaigns" filter is not selected.
The "All" Filter shows all the campaigns
Campaign list is sorted by last modified campaign
The columns Name - Role - Requestor show ellipsis when the value doesn't fit
A tooltip is present with the whole value of the columns(Name - Role - Requestor)
A tooltip is presented with the list of Skills as a hover
Play action icon is shown for campaigns in status "On Hold"
Edit and Pause action button are shown for each campaign
Campaigns contain a second line info with
